parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the Web Application Firewall (WAF) instance.

>  You can call the [DescribeInstance](~~433756~~) operation to query the ID of the WAF instance.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region in which the WAF instance is deployed. Valid values:

*   **cn-hangzhou**: Chinese mainland.
*   **ap-southeast-1**: outside the Chinese mainland.

parameters.name: Resource
parameters.description: The name of the protected object or protected object group that you want to query.

parameters.name: ResourceManagerResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud resource group.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the protected resource. Valid values:

*   **single**: protected object. This is the default value.
*   **group**: protected object group.

parameters.name: RuleId
parameters.description: The ID of the protection rule.

parameters.name: RuleType
parameters.description:
The type of the protection rule. Valid values:

*   **defense**: defense rule. This is the default value.
*   **whitelist**: whitelist rule.

parameters.name: TemplateName
parameters.description: The name of the protection rule template.
